pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualization using Graph Traversal // Improving graphics by ameliorating order effects, using Eulerian tours and Hamiltonian decompositions of graphs. References for the methods presented here are C.B. Hurley and R.W. Oldford (2010) doi:10.1198/jcgs.2010.09136 and C.B. Hurley and R.W. Oldford (2011) doi:10.1007/s00180-011-0229-5.
